info.summary:
Alessandro Campi works as a Assistant professor in Polytechnic University of Milan,Department of Electronics, Information and Bioengineering, and his\her h-index is 17, g-index is 33. His\Her interests are :
 User Interfaces; Web Service; Graphical Interface; Query Language; Data Warehousing;
